author: gdaniels
msg: Various changes to get the new transport architecture working.
* use MessageContext.transportName everywhere, remove TRANS_REQUEST/
TRANS_RESPONSE properties.
* deploy tranports to/from their own registry file.  Persistence and
deployment of Handlers/TypeMappings/Transports/Services needs to be
given some more thought in terms of cleanliness, J2EE integration,
and component packaging...
* fix various places which might generate NPEs
* clean up Admin.list() to be able to use any registry.
* deploy two default http transports, a secure one (with HTTPAuth)
for the servlet and a non-secure one for SimpleAxisServer.
* ServiceClient now has a static "defaultTransport" member which,
if set, overrides the lookup-by-URL.  This enables the TCP
AdminClient to work again, but should be more cleanly architected
(how do we expect to convey which transport to use?)
* fix a couple of bugs in TargetedChainSupplier

author: gdaniels
msg: Fix AdminClient package to match current state.

author: gdaniels
msg: Don't try to share a DocumentBuilder across threads.

author: gdaniels
msg: Fix AdminClient usage to match current state.

author: gdaniels
msg: Oh, and turn off the DEBUG_LOG while we're at it....
